pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Lavender Oil 100% Pure 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Lavender Oil Calming is a multipurpose liquid. 100% pure.

Thursday Plantation Lavender Oil is a versatile pharmaceutical grade multipurpose oil, which can help calm, soothe and relax the body and mind.

Size: 25mL

Fragrance: Lavender

Shelf Life in Days: 1825

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Traditionally used in aromatherapy to relieve nervous tension and mild anxiety
• Promotes restful sleep and improved sleep quality
• Provides temporarily relief to headaches
• Helps to relieve symptoms of eczema
• Provides relief to skin itching and inflamation of tick, wasp and insect bites

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue
use if sensitivity occurs. If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

It is recommended you skin patch test prior to use.
Keep out of reach of children.
Do not use:
- While pregnant or breast-feeding without medical supervision
- Near eyes. Seek medical attention if contact occurs
- On children under 2 years old
- Undiluted on children under 12 years old. Skin patch test prior to use

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Lavender Oil 1mL/mL.

Directions

Bath: To support healthy sleeping patterns, add 5 drops (1/4 mL) to bathwater. Massage: Adults only. To calm the mind, dilute 5 drops (1/4 mL) to 10 mL carrier oil. Apply to temples, forehead, back of neck, shoulders or full body and gently massage. Vaporisation: To support healthy stress response in the body, dilute 5 drops (1/4 mL) to 10 mL in water and disperse using an oil burner or diffuser. Bites: Traditionally used in aromatherapy to relieve symptoms of insect bites and stings. Rub a few drops of oil onto affected area.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
